batchServer.$services.stop.$description: Stop batch controller but let queries alive
batchServer.$services.stopAll.$descripti: Stop batch controller and kill all pending queries
batchServer.$services.queries.$descripti: Display the list of solution's queries
batchServer.$services.syncOldConf.$descr: Synchronize old X3 batch server configuration or initialize it
batchServer.code.$description: Batch controller code is identical to X3 solution code
batchServer.auto.$description: Defines if the batch controller must start at web server startup
batchServer.maxDelay.$title: Maximum delay to launch a query (minutes)
batchServer.refFolder.$description: Mother folder used for administrative tasks
batchServer.x3solution.$description: X3 solution and batch controller can't be unlinked
batchServer.runtimes.$description: The X3 runtimes that can be used to launch batch requests with load balancing. Max active queries set to 0 means 'not active'
